def_cn: (身体或智力有缺陷的人的)特殊需求
def_en: People with special needs are people who need special help or care, for example because they are physically or mentally disabled.

def_cn: (计划、方法、机构等)为有特殊需求人群提供的
def_en: You use special needs to refer to schemes, methods, and organizations which are intended for people with special needs.
